comments.body: Patch for trunk. I'm preparing patch for 2.x branch.

    {color:green}+1 eclipse:eclipse{color}.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    {color:green}+1 findbugs{color}.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    {color:green}+1 release audit{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

bq. It would be better to add the test case for asserting the owner and group are also preserved.
In local fs, these test cases will fail because a test user can't change the owner and group freely. So these tests are not needed.
Fixed formatting.

bq. In addition, mtime is not preserved by "cp -p" in HDFS, but I think it should be addressed by another JIRA.
Sorry, my comment is incorrect. Mtime of a directory is not preserved because a file in the directory is copied after setting mtime of the directory.
I'll update the patch shortly.

The failure looks unrelated to the patch.

Hi, [~ajisakaa].  I came across this issue while reviewing HADOOP-10557 for the new cp -pa option that preserves ACLs.  Do you want to rebase this patch and make sure it works with ACLs too?  I can help with code review and committing it.  Thanks!
I'll rebase the patch and make sure it works with all the attributes by tomorrow. Thanks!
Rebased the patch.
